Title: Reunited
Description:
You look at me and see I am no great warrior. Why was I chosen to be a Paragon? Not all weapons can be seen, Wakener. One should not judge by appearance alone.

Before I explain further, I need to know that you are trustworthy.

Something precious to me was hidden at the time of my preservation. I am nothing without it.

Defend me as I unearth my greatest weapon, and you will have my trust.
ObjectivesText: Assist Kaz'tik the Manipulator as he unearths his greatest weapon.
RewardText: Kovok is just as impressive as the last time I saw him. He will ensure great victories for the Klaxxi.

Objectives.Text: Escort Kaz'tik the Manipulator to the Undisturbed Dirt
